$interpreted: Aosta: Balzac...you little...
Aosta: Dares tell us we need to stay here while she figures out how to handle this. Even used her powers to trap us in here.
Aosta: ...It's already been a day...
Aosta: Dammit to all hell!
Morris: ...Quiet! I am studying.
Aosta: Teacher, you just came back to...you just woke up. Don't strain yourself. You must rest——
Morris: Shut up.
Morris: Don't you know I hate to be disturbed while I'm thinking?
Aosta: ...Yes.

Morris: Scholars have long been aware that Star Soul Energy and Soul Energy of the Cross are complementary. 
What is lacking is a stabilizing Rune that is sufficiently simple in structure.
Morris: One that can stabilize the initial explosive reaction of the two energies yet is small enough to fit into a fixed magic circle.
Morris: A 29-year gap in my knowledge...this is certainly a variable.
Morris: Since this stabilizing Rune has already been researched, we can take the basic principle, reverse it...
Aosta: You've done it...!
Morris: Hmph...
Aosta: You are truly a genius, Professor. Mastering new knowledge just like that!
Aosta: Professor?
Morris: Clovis, could it be that you——
Dorm Student: Who forgot to turn off the light in the lab again!?
Dorm Student: Be more careful, will ya!? If we get busted, the new headmaster's gonna yell at us until our heads fall off!
Tica: Uh~loha...anyone here?
Tica: Nobody? No hiding then popping out of nowhere, okay?
Tica: Darker than a desert night, not a soul in sight~now's the time!
Tica: Cling-clang! The bells chime, it's ~ Tica time! The one, the only, Owl Egg 2 point...
Tica: Hey! No way Jose! Tica stayed up all night making this, give it back!
Tica: Okay~one more time~
Tica: Cling-clang! Tica's specially crafted Owl Egg 2.0 is......complete! Go summon the headmaster and tell him that Elio's returned...
Tica: ...The stuff about Clovis is a bit tricky to explain...
Tica: Whatever, this should do it!
Tica: Headmaster Ceres will understand~
Tica: Go on, go find Owl Boy!
Tica: Eh~What's that?
Tica: Those clouds...they look like a dragon?
Tica: Never seen such strange cloud formations. That's not another one of the professor's failed experiments, is it!?
Barbara: You think the professors are just like you, do you?
Tica: H-H-H-H-H-H-H-H-Headmaster!
Barbara: What on god's green earth are you doing here in the middle of the night? What's with that guilty look? You're not causing trouble again, are you?
Barbara: I warned you last time, your credits...
Tica: It's...I...my stomach hurts...Ugh...OW! Hurts...so...bad...*gasp*...can't even sleep...
Tica: Headmaster Balzac, whatta you doing?
Barbara: I...I'm not feeling well either. Just getting some air. The food at dinner must not have been fresh.
Tica: Ehhhhh~Tica's never seen you in the cafeteria.
Barbara: I-I-I'm a busy woman. As the headmaster and descendant of one of the founders, I must do my utmost!
Tica: Descendant of one of the founders of the Academy?
Barbara: More than 200 years ago, my ancestor Samuel Balzac and some partners founded Rune Academy.
Barbara: ...It's written very clearly in the History of the Academy, Miss Chevalier.
Tica: I must tell you, Headmaster, I don't like history!
Barbara: So that means you don't have to pay attention? You don't want the credits, is that it?
Tica: Uh...
Barbara: Listen, Soul Energy and Runes are the crystallization of many years of research.
Barbara: Therefore, understanding the flow of Soul Energy throughout the ages is a crucial component of Rune research.
Barbara: The School of Bequeathers has always...
Tica: School of Bequeathers? Never heard of it. Is that another school of thought?
Barbara: ...N-Nevermind...
Barbara: The name is not important. The point is, you are gifted. You cannot be lazy.
Barbara: Speaking of which, how'd it go with our guest?
Tica: Oh-Oh-Oh, Tica went and checked on her. Li Hwa's in her room resting~
Barbara: I see. Such a long journey, then getting wrapped up in yesterday's events. She must be utterly exhausted.
Tica: Oh ya? She seemed pretty excited to me...
Barbara: Don't speak out of turn. Thank heavens she promised to keep this a secret, otherwise it'd be a disaster.
Tica: Um, Headmaster...
Barbara: If you have something to say, just say it.
Tica: Alrighty!
Tica: Will you accept Professor Clovis' proposal?
Barbara: ......
Tica: Professor Clovis said that as long as the headmaster protects them, he'll share all of his research on Crystals with the Academy.
Tica: I mean, resurrecting a person; that's what I call an experiment!! I'm not in the School of Life Magic, but boy was that moving~
Tica: You're definitely gonna accept, right!?
Barbara: ......
Tica: Hey! You're not gonna do it!? Why not!?
Barbara: ...It's not as easy as you think. Elio is a traitor to the Kingdom of the Sun; there's a bounty out for him.
Tica: But he's not Elio. That's Professor Morris!
Barbara: This is merely a hypothesis, there's no solid proof that this is the case. What if the Queen of the Kingdom doesn't believe?
Tica: Hmmmm...
Tica: Got it!
Tica: Just don't let her find out!
Barbara: ...If only I were as optimistic as you...
Tica: Did I just hear an explosion?
Barbara: Better not be what I think it is...

Model.Text: Balzac...you little...
Dares tell us we need to stay here while she figures out how to handle this. Even used her powers to trap us in here.
...It's already been a day...
Dammit to all hell!
...Quiet! I am studying.
Teacher, you just came back to...you just woke up. Don't strain yourself. You must rest——
Shut up.
Don't you know I hate to be disturbed while I'm thinking?
...Yes.

Scholars have long been aware that Star Soul Energy and Soul Energy of the Cross are complementary. 
What is lacking is a stabilizing Rune that is sufficiently simple in structure.
One that can stabilize the initial explosive reaction of the two energies yet is small enough to fit into a fixed magic circle.
A 29-year gap in my knowledge...this is certainly a variable.
Since this stabilizing Rune has already been researched, we can take the basic principle, reverse it...
You've done it...!
Hmph...
You are truly a genius, Professor. Mastering new knowledge just like that!
Professor?
Clovis, could it be that you——
Who forgot to turn off the light in the lab again!?
Be more careful, will ya!? If we get busted, the new headmaster's gonna yell at us until our heads fall off!
Uh~loha...anyone here?
Nobody? No hiding then popping out of nowhere, okay?
Darker than a desert night, not a soul in sight~now's the time!
Cling-clang! The bells chime, it's ~ Tica time! The one, the only, Owl Egg 2 point...
Hey! No way Jose! Tica stayed up all night making this, give it back!
Okay~one more time~
Cling-clang! Tica's specially crafted Owl Egg 2.0 is......complete! Go summon the headmaster and tell him that Elio's returned...
...The stuff about Clovis is a bit tricky to explain...
Whatever, this should do it!
Headmaster Ceres will understand~
Go on, go find Owl Boy!
Eh~What's that?
Those clouds...they look like a dragon?
Never seen such strange cloud formations. That's not another one of the professor's failed experiments, is it!?
You think the professors are just like you, do you?
H-H-H-H-H-H-H-H-Headmaster!
What on god's green earth are you doing here in the middle of the night? What's with that guilty look? You're not causing trouble again, are you?
I warned you last time, your credits...

I...I'm not feeling well either. Just getting some air. The food at dinner must not have been fresh.

Uh...
Listen, Soul Energy and Runes are the crystallization of many years of research.
Therefore, understanding the flow of Soul Energy throughout the ages is a crucial component of Rune research.
The School of Bequeathers has always...

...N-Nevermind...
The name is not important. The point is, you are gifted. You cannot be lazy.
Speaking of which, how'd it go with our guest?

I see. Such a long journey, then getting wrapped up in yesterday's events. She must be utterly exhausted.
Oh ya? She seemed pretty excited to me...
Don't speak out of turn. Thank heavens she promised to keep this a secret, otherwise it'd be a disaster.
Um, Headmaster...
If you have something to say, just say it.
Alrighty!
Will you accept Professor Clovis' proposal?
Professor Clovis said that as long as the headmaster protects them, he'll share all of his research on Crystals with the Academy.
I mean, resurrecting a person; that's what I call an experiment!! I'm not in the School of Life Magic, but boy was that moving~
You're definitely gonna accept, right!?
Hey! You're not gonna do it!? Why not!?

Got it!

Did I just hear an explosion?

You cannot be lazy.","sfxName":"human_female_young_royal_14","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Speaking of which, how'd it go with our guest?","sfxName":"human_female_young_royal_02","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh-Oh-Oh, Tica went and checked on her. Li Hwa's in her room resting~","sfxName":"h0010_story_025","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I see. Such a long journey, then getting wrapped up in yesterday's events. She must be utterly exhausted.","sfxName":"human_female_young_royal_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_31_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh ya? She seemed pretty excited to me...","sfxName":"h0010_story_017","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_31_002","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't speak out of turn. Thank heavens she promised to keep this a secret, otherwise it'd be a disaster.","sfxName":"human_female_young_royal_01","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Um, Headmaster...","sfxName":"h0010_story_026","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If you have something to say, just say it.","sfxName":"human_female_young_royal_01","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Alrighty!","sfxName":"h0010_story_019","sfxVolume":0.9},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Will you accept Professor Clovis' proposal?","sfxName":"h0010_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_34_002","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_34_003","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Professor Clovis said that as long as the headmaster protects them, he'll share all of his research on Crystals with the Academy.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I mean, resurrecting a person; that's what I call an experiment!! I'm not in the School of Life Magic, but boy was that moving~","sfxName":"h0010_story_016","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're definitely gonna accept, right!?","sfxName":"h0010_story_019","sfxVolume":0.9},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_35_002","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hey! You're not gonna do it!? Why not!?","sfxName":"h0010_story_007","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...It's not as easy as you think. Elio is a traitor to the Kingdom of the Sun; there's a bounty out for him.","sfxName":"human_female_young_royal_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But he's not Elio. That's Professor Morris!","sfxName":"h0010_story_023","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_36_003","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is merely a hypothesis, there's no solid proof that this is the case. What if the Queen of the Kingdom doesn't believe?","sfxName":"human_female_young_royal_01","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_36_004","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmmmm...","sfxName":"h0010_story_026","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Got it!","sfxName":"h0010_story_019","sfxVolume":0.9},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Just don't let her find out!","sfxName":"h0010_story_025","sfxVolume":0.9},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...If only I were as optimistic as you...","sfxName":"human_female_middle_royal_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Did I just hear an explosion?","sfxName":"h0010_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_001_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Better not be what I think it is...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
